Portal 2 is one of the most visually impressive, story immersive, and all around fantastic games of all time. It's extremely well done, and is worth every penny. I've played hundreds of hours on Xbox, and recently got it for PC and couldn't love it more. I will always consider this THE best game of all time.
Portal 2 is has amazing puzzles and amazing story that will make you want to play until you finish the game.

LEGEND.

Juego de puzzles muy entretenido con puzzles complejos, una historia divertida, modo cooperativo con bastantes niveles y un soundtrack perfecto con sonidos chiptune.
Si no has jugado antes a portal 2 ya es hora de que juegues, portal 2 es el mejor juego de puzzles que te puedes encontrar. Con un inmneso numero de niveles en el workshop tanto para singleplayer como para cooperativo que hará que nunca te canses del juego.
En definitiva portal 2 es un juego con una historia muy bien elaborada con muchos toques de humor, Además del modo cooperativo donde hay que estár en perfecta sincronía con tu compañero para poder pasar de nivel.
Игра просто супер, получилась даже лучше первой части, что случается довольно редко.
I have to say that if you were to buy one game, buy this one. I have gotten OBSESED with portal and portal 2, they both have great story lines and gameplay. This is a perfect game in my opinion.
Portalrific...

Quem nunca jogou Portal, precisa começar a jogar. O 2 possui muito mais puzzles, além do multiplayer coop que é ótimo! Diferente de qualquer FPS que existe, porque seu objetivo não é matar. Jogo para quebrar a cabeça e é esse tipo de jogo que faz falta hoje em dia. Quando for jogar o modo história, recomendo analisar todos os locais que você passar e fazer todas as conquistas do jogo, pois têm MUITOS easter eggs espalhados pelo jogo, alguns respondem questões sobre o enredo, outros nos fazem criar mais teorias. 
Also, GLaDOS rainha, Wheatley nadinha.

One of my favorite games of all time.

Portal 2, like its predecessor Portal, is a great, fun, and challenging first-person puzzle-platform game. A lot of players seem to be biased and prefer the original game simply because of the fact that it came first and introduced the concept of portals. Although both games have their own strengths and weaknesses, Portal 2 is superior in almost every way; featuring a significantly longer storyline, a more detailed environment, more characters, and more gameplay mechanics.

I definitely recommend this game. You will not regret your purchase!
便宜还好玩，买买买就是了。

Der erste Teil war grandios. Portal 2 ist zwar eine große technische Verbesserung zum Vorgänger, kommt storytechnisch  für mich aber nicht an Portal (1) heran, auch wenn man eine längere Storyline vor sich hat. Trotzdem mag ich das Spiel, dank seiner einzigartigen Weise den Spieler an die einzelnen Puzzle zu binden. Sie werden linear komplizierter und ab und zu gibt es ein paar Gehirnpausen mit einfacheren Leveln. 
Nur der Endkampf hat sich für mich ein wenig unflüssig und kaotisch angefühlt.

Alles in Allem würde ich dieses Spiel unbedingt an JEDEN weiterempfehlen, egal ob jung, alt, Shooterspieler, oder Puzzlespieler.
В первый раз я запустил без проблем. Во второй раз как бы я не запускал вылетает(((((((((   ну а так агра классная

最もハグしてあげたい悪役で賞にノミネートしました。このゲームはSteamで初めて購入したゲームだったのですが、パズルの難易度が頑張ればクリアできるうまい具合の調整でストレスなく遊べ、またストーリーも心動かされるものでした。僕は前作をやってはいないのですが、十分に楽しめる内容だと思います。Steamを持つユーザー全員にやってもらいたい、そんなゲームです！

Portal é uma inventiva série de jogos de ação e quebra-cabeça desenvolvida pela Valve Corporation. O jogo consiste basicamente de uma série de enigmas que devem ser resolvidos com uma ferramenta criadores de portais de teletransporte.
Great challenging puzzle game, learning curve is almost perfect, with many concepts introduced intuitively that have to be combined to solve later challenging levels.
love it
当通关的那一刻，我心中没有充满的成就感，而是满满的压抑，我在想如果我被一个朋友背叛，我会怎么做，当面临曾经的敌人，我又将怎么做，然而我不敢想，也不敢做，对我来说很难做出抉择。。。。。。

I personally loved the game. I beat it in about 3 hours, because i played it once before on Xbox, but it was still fun as hell, and i found a few more secrets :) The multiplayer is challenging yet creative, and my firiend and I had a blast. I would recommend this game to anyone who is looking for a challenging, fun, and/or compelling game
